column4: ok, i dont know here to ask, but anways: i have a small c-program that runs system("script.sh"); and script.sh runs whoami; the c-program i chmodded +s and owned by me. if i do sudo -u www-data ./c-program i get "www-data" not my username
have I unsterstood this with setting the S bit wrong?
You might want to look into the C programming channel
